top.title: Trump signs bill ordering justice department to release Epstein files
top.summary: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

top.title: US military officials in Ukraine for talks on ending war
top.summary: It comes amid reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly containing major concessions for Ukraine.

top.title: Turkey set to host COP31 after reaching compromise with Australia
top.summary: Australia will now support the Turkish bid to host the climate talks in return for their minister chairing them.

top.title: Nvidia shares jump after revenue and outlook top estimates
top.summary: The chip maker says revenue for the three months to October jumped 62% to $57bn.

top.title: Ford boss: 'Now is not the time to tax electric vehicles'
top.summary: Ford's UK boss says it is "not the right time" to tax electric vehicles when demand has already stalled.

top.title: Instagram to start closing Australian teen accounts ahead of social media ban
top.summary: Under-sixteens will be banned from major social media plaforms from 10 December.

Netflix signs a three year deal to stream MLB live events and games
